item.description:
The park is open!!

The painting that we wanted to do will have to be put on hold due to saturday's rain since most painting and staining requires dry wood. I will buy some wire brushes so we can start to de-chip the tables.

Let's meet @ noon (should have stopped raining by then) near the INFO board on the Big Dog side and meet and discuss what to do next!

See you there
item.how_to_find_us: Near the INFO Board on Big Dog Side
item.name: Wethersfield Dog Park Committee October Meetup
